Marco Pas wrote:

> Is there a way to combine unit-testing with load-testing ?
> I read about JUnitPP and JMeter ?
> 
> I think the use of JUnit in combination with JMeter would be thw way
> to go. Couldd someone point me in the right direction.
> 


The LoadTest test decorator included in the freely-available JUnitPerf 
(http://www.clarkware.com/software/JUnitPerf.html) allows you to run an 
existing JUnit test with a simulated number of concurrent users and user 
iterations.  The LoadTest can also be decorated with a TimedTest to test 
the overall response time of the test under load.
